mapper.insert: insert into vending_machine.product(id, name, brand, price, stock, status, create_time) VALUES (#{id},#{name},#{brand},#{price},#{stock},#{status},current_timestamp)
mapper.update: UPDATE vending_machine.product SET name = #{name}, brand = #{brand}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, status = #{status}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, brand, price, stock, status, create_time, update_time from vending_machine.product where stock < low_stock_threshold and status = 1
